citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:55pm on
Wednesday, January 15, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and then calling
the phone number on file. The licensee answered and let the inspector know they were out of town for the day. Failure to
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure
to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:55pm on 
Wednesday, January 15, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and then calling 
the phone number on file. The licensee answered and let the inspector know they were out of town for the day. Failure to 
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure 
to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
